(function(e,t){typeof module!="undefined"&&module.exports?module.exports=t():typeof define=="function"&&define.amd?define(t):this[e]=t()})("$script",function(){function p(e,t){for(var n=0,i=e.length;n<i;++n)if(!t(e[n]))return r;return 1}function d(e,t){p(e,function(e){return!t(e)})}function v(e,t,n){function g(e){return e.call?e():u[e]}function y(){if(!--h){u[o]=1,s&&s();for(var e in f)p(e.split("|"),g)&&!d(f[e],g)&&(f[e]=[])}}e=e[i]?e:[e];var r=t&&t.call,s=r?t:n,o=r?e.join(""):t,h=e.length;return setTimeout(function(){d(e,function t(e,n){if(e===null)return y();e=!n&&e.indexOf(".js")===-1&&!/^https?:\/\//.test(e)&&c?c+e+".js":e;if(l[e])return o&&(a[o]=1),l[e]==2?y():setTimeout(function(){t(e,!0)},0);l[e]=1,o&&(a[o]=1),m(e,y)})},0),v}function m(n,r){var i=e.createElement("script"),u;i.onload=i.onerror=i[o]=function(){if(i[s]&&!/^c|loade/.test(i[s])||u)return;i.onload=i[o]=null,u=1,l[n]=2,r()},i.async=1,i.src=h?n+(n.indexOf("?")===-1?"?":"&")+h:n,t.insertBefore(i,t.lastChild)}var e=document,t=e.getElementsByTagName("head")[0],n="string",r=!1,i="push",s="readyState",o="onreadystatechange",u={},a={},f={},l={},c,h;return v.get=m,v.order=function(e,t,n){(function r(i){i=e.shift(),e.length?v(i,r):v(i,t,n)})()},v.path=function(e){c=e},v.urlArgs=function(e){h=e},v.ready=function(e,t,n){e=e[i]?e:[e];var r=[];return!d(e,function(e){u[e]||r[i](e)})&&p(e,function(e){return u[e]})?t():!function(e){f[e]=f[e]||[],f[e][i](t),n&&n(r)}(e.join("|")),v},v.done=function(e){v([null],e)},v})</script>
<script type="text/javascript">!function a(b,c,d){function e(g,h){if(!c[g]){if(!b[g]){var i="function"==typeof require&&require;if(!h&&i)return i(g,!0);if(f)return f(g,!0);var j=new Error("Cannot find module '"+g+"'");throw j.code="MODULE_NOT_FOUND",j}var k=c[g]={exports:{}};b[g][0].call(k.exports,function(a){var c=b[g][1][a];return e(c||a)},k,k.exports,a,b,c,d)}return c[g].exports}for(var f="function"==typeof require&&require,g=0;g<d.length;g++)e(d[g]);return e}({1:[function(a,b,c){!function(){function a(a,b){a&&b&&(window.BOOMR_onload=(new Date).getTime(),window.BOOMR.page_ready())}function b(){window.BOOMR.subscribe("before_beacon",function(){window.BOOMR.addVar({digitalData:JSON.stringify(window.digitalData)})})}function c(a){k.BOOMR_onload=a&&a.timeStamp||(new Date).getTime()}var d;try{d=window.TMCONFIG.mpulse.apikey}catch(l){console.warn("Couldn't find mpulse api key: "+l)}if(d)if(document.addEventListener("onBoomerangLoaded",b),window.TMCONFIG.mpulse.event){window.BOOMR_config={autorun:!1};var e=!1,f=!1;window.addEventListener(window.TMCONFIG.mpulse.event,function(){e=!0,a(f,e)}),window.BOOMR_lstart=(new Date).getTime(),$script("//c.go-mpulse.net/boomerang/"+d,function(){f=!0,a(f,e)})}else{if(window.BOOMR&&window.BOOMR.version)return;var g,h,i,j=document.createElement("iframe"),k=window;k.addEventListener?k.addEventListener("load",c,!1):k.attachEvent&&k.attachEvent("onload",c),j.src="javascript:void(0)",j.title="",j.role="presentation",(j.frameElement||j).style.cssText="width:0;height:0;border:0;display:none;",i=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0],i.parentNode.insertBefore(j,i);try{h=j.contentWindow.document}catch(l){g=document.domain,j.src="javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='"+g+"';void(0);",h=j.contentWindow.document}h.open()._l=function(){var a=this.createElement("script");g&&(this.domain=g),a.id="boomr-if-as",a.src="//c.go-mpulse.net/boomerang/"+d,BOOMR_lstart=(new Date).getTime(),this.body.appendChild(a)},h.write('<body onload="document._l();">'),h.close()}}()},{}]},{},[1]);
//# sourceMappingURL=mpulse.min.js.map</script>
<meta id="partnerConfig" name="partnerConfig" content="{&quot;buysell&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;buysell&quot;},&quot;book an ad&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;book an ad&quot;},&quot;family notices&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;family notices&quot;},&quot;jobs&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;madgex&quot;},&quot;property&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;Drag &amp; Drop&quot;},&quot;buyaphoto&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;buy a photo&quot;},&quot;dating&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;dating&quot;},&quot;motors&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;Pistonheads (Auto Car)&quot;},&quot;travel&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;Travel&quot;},&quot;plus rewards&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;Plus Rewards&quot;},&quot;directory&quot;:{&quot;partnerName&quot;:&quot;Scoot/Directory&quot;}}"/>

</head>
<body class="section-page">

<main class="mod-pancakes">
<nav class="breadcrumbs" xmlns:vocabulary="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><ol><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a class="publication-theme-highlight publication-theme-icon" href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">Home</a></li><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/news/" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">News</a></li></ol></nav>
<div id="premium-subscribe-button" style="height: 0; overflow: visible;"></div>
<div class="topic-head channel-topic"><h1>Swansea</h1><div class="topic-intro"><figure class="mod-image" data-mod="image"><div class="image-outer"><img data-src="http://i3.walesonline.co.uk/incoming/article12721430.ece/ALTERNATES/s298/swansea-online.jpg" data-height="198" data-width="298" altText=""></div></figure><div class="topic-intro-text"><p class="hidden"></p><div class="topic-more-on"><p>Welcome to <b>SwanseaOnline</b> - your home for the best news, sports and what's on coverage from Swansea. You can follow us on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/SwanseaOnline1/">Facebook</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/SWEveningPost">Twitter</a> too.</p>
<br /><br /><p>Looking for a different part of South West Wales?</p>
<br /><p>- <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/carmarthen">Carmarthen news</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/llanelli">Llanelli news</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/neath">Neath news</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/port-talbot">Port Talbot news</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/in-your-area">All other areas</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/swansea-city-fc">Swansea City news</a> - <a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/ospreys">Ospreys news</a></p></div><time itemprop="dateModified" content="2017-09-06T09:15:26.000+0000" datetime="2017-09-06T09:15:26.000+0000">10:15, 6 SEP 2017</time></div></div></div><section data-group="wipeout"></section><div class="primary"><section data-group="topStories"><div class="pancake solo wide" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="0"><div class="teaser teaser-prominent teaser-wide"><figure data-mod="image"><div class="spacer" style="padding-top:66.50%;"></div><a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/news/local-news/woman-grabbed-pcs-testicles-spat-13577984"><img data-srcset="http://i4.walesonline.co.uk/incoming/article13579062.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/MorristonAE.jpg 508w, http://i4.walesonline.co.uk/incoming/article13579062.ece/ALTERNATES/s540/MorristonAE.jpg 540w" data-src="http://i4.walesonline.co.uk/incoming/article13579062.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/MorristonAE.jpg"></a></figure><div class="inner"><em class="section-theme-highlight"><a class="section-theme-highlight" href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/all-about/crime">Crime</a></em><strong class="publication-font"><a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/news/local-news/woman-grabbed-pcs-testicles-spat-13577984">Woman grabbed PC's testicles and spat at him after officers took her to hospital</a></strong><div class="description"><a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/news/local-news/woman-grabbed-pcs-testicles-spat-13577984">Police officers took her to hospital because there were no ambulances available</a></div></div></div></div><div class="pancake duet" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="1"><div class="teaser"><figure data-mod="image"><div class="spacer" business to be done quickly</a></strong><div class="comments-count" data-streamId="walesonline-13500322" data-mod="teaserCounter"><a href="http://www.walesonline.co.uk/sport/football/swansea-city-0-manchester-united-13500322">The Swans battled gamely until United cut loose during the closing stages</a></div></div></div><div class="teaser"><figure data-mod="image"><div class="spacer" style="padding-top:66.50%;"></div><a
